page.title: 04Family Life in Chorleywood
page.content: On Monday morning Mum is always the first one to get up. Then follows Dad and then my sister and I. We do not have breakfast together because Dad has to leave for work early and so he must have an early breakfast. Soon afterwards my friend comes to call for me and my sister's friend calls for her and then we both walk to school. On weekdays we hardly ever eat together because Dad always arrives home late from work. At the weekends though we do. On Saturday we normally will go for a walk or a publunch. We wear jeans and teeshirts or skirts and teeshirts which of course Dad does not wear. We go to a hotel which has been built in Chorleywood, called "The Sportsman" and has a restaurant and a snack food place which is open to the public that are not living at the hotel and have come to eat.
